name: Phoenix Protocol
description:
Created for VIST 487 - Game Development at Texas A&M University by Team 2: Aaron Drew, Ryan Jacovetty, Sarah Jecker, Brenton Lenzen, Bailey Robinson, and Lauren Sudak. 

The world is a simulation, but the file has become corrupted. The system is stuck in a loop, trying to initiate the Phoenix Protocol to go back to when everything worked, but it never goes back far enough. It is up to you to contact the creators of the simulation to get them to fix it. 

Navigate a simulation that is no longer spatially logical and learn as much as you can in each loop before the system resets so that you can figure out how to contact your creators and fix the system.
